priorVersion.title: CDISC SDTM Gastrointestinal Test Name Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C128681

self.title: CDISC SDTM Gastrointestinal Test Name Terminology

definition: A terminology codelist based on the test names for physiological findings related to the gastrointestinal system.
name: Gastrointestinal Test Name
preferredTerm: CDISC SDTM Gastrointestinal Test Name Terminology

terms.definition: An indication as to whether bowel obstruction has occurred.
An indication as to whether bowel perforation has occurred.
A quantitative measurement of an organ's ability to deform in response to physiological force and return to its normal shape by passive elastic recoil.
An indication as to whether lymphovascular invasion by tumor cells has occurred.
A measurement of the distance between the rectal tumor and the anal margin.
terms.preferredTerm: Rectal Tumor to Anal Verge Distance
terms.submissionValue: Rectal Tumor to Anal Verge Distance
synonyms: Rectal Tumor to Anal Verge Distance
